places.name: Taj Mahal
places.famous: Iconic white marble mausoleum, UNESCO World Heritage Site
places.details: Built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his wife, Mumtaz Mahal.

places.name: Jaipur (Pink City)
places.details: Explore attractions like Amber Fort, Hawa Mahal, and City Palace.

places.name: Khajuraho Group of Monuments
places.famous: Intricate stone carvings, UNESCO World Heritage Site
places.details: Temples known for their exquisite sculptures depicting various aspects of life.

places.name: Kerala Backwaters
places.budget: Affordable houseboat rates starting from ₹3,000 ($42) per night
places.details: Explore the backwaters of Alleppey and Kumarakom on traditional houseboats.

places.name: Rishikesh
places.budget: Budget accommodations starting from ₹500-1500 ($7-$21) per night
places.details: Known as the Yoga Capital of the World and offers thrilling activities like river rafting.

places.name: Leh-Ladakh
places.budget: Budget accommodations starting from ₹800-2000 ($11-$28) per night
places.details: Explore the stunning valleys, lakes, and monasteries in this remote region.

places.name: Goa
places.budget: Budget accommodations starting from ₹800-2000 ($11-$28) per night
places.details: Enjoy sun-soaked beaches, water sports, and a laid-back coastal atmosphere.

places.name: Kovalam Beach
places.details: Relax on the golden sands and witness mesmerizing sunsets.

places.name: Varkala Beach
places.famous: Cliffs overlooking the Arabian Sea, mineral springs
places.details: Enjoy a unique beach experience with cliffside views and Ayurvedic treatments.

places.name: Jim Corbett National Park
places.famous: Bengal tigers, diverse flora and fauna
places.details: India's oldest national park, ideal for wildlife safaris and birdwatching.

places.name: Periyar National Park
places.details: Explore the wildlife-rich forests and enjoy boating in the Periyar Lake.

places.name: Kaziranga National Park
places.details: Home to the largest population of one-horned rhinoceroses and various other wildlife species.
